If you are running in idea, you should start the methon of LoggerServer.java#main    in the source code. 

```java
dolphinscheduler-server/src/main/java/org/apache/dolphinscheduler/server/log/LoggerServer.java#main
```
If you start from the command line, you should start logger server  use commond line on the worker's machine 

```shell
sh   bin/dolphinscheduler-daemon.sh start logger-server
```
